name: 增强型均线交叉策略
description: 多重技术指标过滤的均线交叉策略，结合RSI、MACD、成交量等指标提高信号质量

buy_conditions.condition: SMA(收盘, params['短期均线']) > SMA(收盘, params['长期均线']) and SMA(收盘, params['短期均线']).shift(1) <= SMA(收盘, params['长期均线']).shift(1)
buy_conditions.description: 短期均线上穿长期均线

buy_conditions.condition: RSI(收盘, params['RSI周期']) > 30 and RSI(收盘, params['RSI周期']) < 70
buy_conditions.description: RSI在合理区间，避免超买超卖

buy_conditions.condition: MACD(收盘, params['MACD快线'], params['MACD慢线'], params['MACD信号线'])['MACD'] > MACD(收盘, params['MACD快线'], params['MACD慢线'], params['MACD信号线'])['Signal']
成交量 > SMA(成交量, params['成交量均线']) * 1.2
收盘 > SMA(收盘, params['长期均线']) * 1.02
buy_conditions.description: 价格明显突破长期均线

buy_conditions.condition: ATR(最高, 最低, 收盘, params['ATR周期']) / 收盘 < 0.05
buy_conditions.description: 波动率适中，避免过度波动

sell_conditions.condition: SMA(收盘, params['短期均线']) < SMA(收盘, params['长期均线']) and SMA(收盘, params['短期均线']).shift(1) >= SMA(收盘, params['长期均线']).shift(1)
sell_conditions.description: 短期均线下穿长期均线

sell_conditions.condition: MACD(收盘, params['MACD快线'], params['MACD慢线'], params['MACD信号线'])['MACD'] < MACD(收盘, params['MACD快线'], params['MACD慢线'], params['MACD信号线'])['Signal']
成交量 > SMA(成交量, params['成交量均线']) * 1.5

position_sizing.description: 基于波动率的仓位管理
